description.displayText: Janeth has worked with our family for well over a year and we absolutely love her!  Our 2 children 1 and 3 adore her.  She is very caring, has a calm and balanced manner with the kids, wise beyond her years and very mature.  She works super hard, is professional, reliable, always on time and has always done whatever she can to accommodate any extra hours, staying late when I was stuck.  I trust the care of my 2 children to her without thinking twice.  Having worked with a number of casual babysitters over the last 3-4 years I can't recommend Janeth highly enough, she is everything you could ever need in a caregiver.  She helps with kids meal prep, the kitchen is always spotless when she's finished, and she has the kids fed and ready for bed and calm and the place put back together by 6pm in a way I can never achieve trying to do myself..    We lost our full time Nanny of 3.5 years recently and Janeth saved us over the summer stepping in and taking it on.  She is also a joy to be around

description.displayText: Janeth has done some housekeeping work and taken care of my 6 month old baby. She has fed her, changed diapers, put her to sleep among other things. Janeth had also done late night stays with my baby. As for housekeeping she's very detailed and keeps everything organized. I provided the cleaning products. She's very responsible and punctual and has a genuine caring personality in all things. I continue to use her service on a part time basis.

description.displayText: Janeth is by far the best babysitter I've hired to take care of my 3 year old son. As a student studying for my Master's degree, Janeth has been available to watch my son whenever I needed her to. Little M. recognizes her immediately because he loves the games that she can come up with off the top of her head! She is stellar with children!
